If it's a referent with a referent, then it's the view factor.
It's the aspect of views.
Their essence isn't separate from each other.
That is, it's not separate from the essence of the aspect of self-realization.
The implication is this.
The aspectual part is a proximate causal object of the aspect of views.

source_sentence: 見分是自證分親所緣緣。
translation: The aspect of views is a condition that's proximate to the aspect of self-witnessing.
Neither is separate from the essence of the self-witnessing aspect.
This is a brief description of the proximate causation that is the cognition factor.
It's the raw substance of the Dharma.
It's expected to be the cognizing factor that's the cognizing factor.
It's because there are aspects that are free from the eight consciousnesses.
This also briefly describes the aspect of what's changed by others.
and the eight consciousnesses in themselves.
Each has a characteristic part that's transformed.
They also look at each other.
They aren't related.
Now, we're only taking the aspect of what's changed by our own consciousness.
It's called intimate.
He expects the aspect of views that is capable of transformation to be the same.
They aren't separate in essence.
There's nothing in between that separates them.
Only then does it mean intimate.

source_sentence: 言是見分等內所慮託者。
translation: He says it's an internal consideration entrusted to him by the factors of views and so forth.
He refers to the factors of views and so forth.

source_sentence: 即等取自證分及第四分。
translation: It's the same as taking the self-witnessing aspect and the fourth aspect.
It's also the condition of original knowing such as this.
These are all formed as proximate causal conditions.
Moreover, this is the aspect of thusness.
These are the factors of views that are the family's proximate causative object.
The aspect of seeing ...
These are the proximate causal conditions of the self-witnessing aspect.
The self-witnessing aspect is the condition that's proximate to the self-witnessing aspect.
These are the conditions that are proximate to the verifying aspect of self-realization.
It's also true thusness.
It's the proximate causal object of fundamental knowledge.

source_sentence: 又等取心心所緣親相分。
translation: It's also the proximate aspect of the mental faculties of equally grasped minds and the proximate perceptual objects of perceptual objects.
They're also proximate causal conditions.
All of the above are contingent on being held together.
Zongjing lu, vol. 70

source_sentence: 戊申歲分司大藏都監開板
translation: Eshinsei yoseido dazangdu jieban
